bug.short_desc: Can not register on http://qooxdoo.org/forum - verification code problem

long_desc.thetext: I can not register on http://qooxdoo.org/forum. Every time I try to register, I'm getting "The validation code did not match the picture". Tried it many times, pretty sure I recognize and type the verification code correctly.

This is an external service we use called nabble. We only supply the mailing list to this service where you should be abel to register: https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/qooxdoo-devel
Maybe you should get in touch with the support guys at nabble to solve that problem as we can't do much about it: http://support.nabble.com/

I made it work for me, and now I'd like to share the details with you. Feel free to close the bug again, if you still think nothing can or should be done on your side.
If I open http://qooxdoo.org/forum in my browser and try to post something to the forum (mailing list), it does not work. All attempts to log in or register fail. However if I then right-click somewhere in the middle of the page, and choose "This Frame" and then "Show Only This Frame" (I'm using Firefox), then everything immediately starts working as expected.
Also if I go directly to http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/, everything also works fine.
The http://qooxdoo.org/community page provides the http://qooxdoo.org/forum link to the Nabble interface to your mailing list. I suggest you to change it to point to http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/ instead.
Ah, so the iframe is the root cause of the issue. Strange but you suggestion is valid that we should not link to a not working page. Will keep that issue and see if we simply change the link.
Just talked to the team and we decided to get rid of the frame and link directly to the nabble forum.

Just gave it another try and tried to register me and that worked in the frame without a problem. So maybe nabble already fixed that issue but anyway, I close that bug as we won't change anything as its working as it is.
